metadata.title: CVE-2017-6463 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
NTP before 4.2.8p10 and 4.3.x before 4.3.94 allows remote authenticatedusers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via an invalid setting ina :config directive, related to the unpeer option.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6463` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntp - 1:4.2.8p10+dfsg-5ubuntu1
ntpdate - 1:4.2.8p10+dfsg-5ubuntu1
sntp - 1:4.2.8p10+dfsg-5ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntp package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.8p10+dfsg-5ubuntu1').
